text: The Nova Avanhandava Dam is an embankment dam with gravity sections on the Tietê River about southwest of Buritama in São Paulo state of Brazil. It supports a hydroelectric power station. The dam was completed in 1982 and its three Kaplan turbine-generators were commissioned by the same year. It is owned and operated by AES Tietê. The dam also provides for navigation with two ship locks. ==References== ==External links== Category:Dams completed in 1982 Category:Energy infrastructure completed in 1982 Category:Dams in São Paulo (state) Category:Embankment dams Category:Hydroelectric power stations in Brazil Category:Locks of Brazil Category:1982 establishments in Brazil
title: Nova Avanhandava Dam
